title: BigFish Games Zoo Vet 2 Endangered Animals [h33t][windy9009]
description:
Zoo Vet 2: Endangered Animals, Simulation

Have you ever wondered what it&#039;s like to be a real-life veterinarian? Here&#039;s your chance! You&#039;re responsible for treating endangered animals, including elephants, lions, zebras, crocodiles, polar bears and many more!

You need a steady hand as you use realistic medical tools to treat broken bones, cuts, diseases and even perform surgeries! The African Wildlife Foundation provided information that is used in the game and receives a portion of every purchase!

Features:
* Diagnose and treat 20 different endangered animals.
* Master 30 unique scenarios, all created by real veterinarians.
* Interact with delightful, funny vet technicians and visitors throughout the zoo.
* 3 levels of play allow animal lovers, future vets and professionals alike to successfully treat animals.
* Open-ended gameplay plus fascinating trivia, memory and other mini-games - perfect for the whole family!

System Requirements:
- Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista
- P2 650 MHz
- 128 MB RAM
- DirectX 8.1
- AGP Video Card
- Sound Card

Thanks to TAC-CM
